price: It is We Who created them and strengthened their build. If We will, We can replace them with others like them.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
